column1: #Text=Sokka says : " We better speed things up . "
#Text=Aang says : " Maybe we should be a little nicer to the swamp . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Aang , these are just plants .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you should listen to Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm sure there are lots of things that are alive here and if we do n't wan na wind up getting eaten by them , we need to find Appa as fast as we can .
